rev.desc.rev.desc: anel: del.approval.item
Change
approval.status in $L.file="approved"
To
approval.status in $L.file=""
$L.void=jscall("Interaction.cancelInteractionRequest", $L.file)
remove panel post
Related record can't be created if remove approvals for Service Catalog category for interactions
Change record is created unexpectedly after an interaction associated with a Service Catalog order is closed
1. Delete panel del.approval.1
2. Add panel del.approval.1 of type process to set query: $L.approval.query="file.name=\"Approval\" and unique.key=\""+incident.id in $L.file+"\""
exsits: normal: del.approval.approver
3. Add panel del.approval.approver of type us.delete to delete all approvers
Filename: Approval
Query: $L.approval.query
exists: normal: del.approval.item
Update panel:decide.update.approval, call cc.set.approval when cartId not null or category is "service catalog" after add.
update approval status after call.cc.set.approval
add panel call.cc.set.approval, migrated from trigger.incidents.before.post
Service Catalog: If ESS user cancels request the approvals are not removed from the approver's list
function sig change function setApprovalsRecordState(id, state)
Made changes for TeleCenter/Connect.It. intergration ST22997
Added call to billing after call to generate explines.
Changed panel set in trigger.incidents.after.update to set operator in $L.cmlabor=operator() instead of operator in $L.cmlabor=opened.by in $L.file
Switched error message to include last panel executed.
Added message to the error exit so that we will have some indication that there was a problem.
Only cut expense lines if module is enabled

descript.descript: anel: del.approval.item
Change
approval.status in $L.file="approved"
To
approval.status in $L.file=""
$L.void=jscall("Interaction.cancelInteractionRequest", $L.file)
remove panel post
Related record can't be created if remove approvals for Service Catalog category for interactions
Change record is created unexpectedly after an interaction associated with a Service Catalog order is closed
1. Delete panel del.approval.1
2. Add panel del.approval.1 of type process to set query: $L.approval.query="file.name=\"Approval\" and unique.key=\""+incident.id in $L.file+"\""
exsits: normal: del.approval.approver
3. Add panel del.approval.approver of type us.delete to delete all approvers
Filename: Approval
Query: $L.approval.query
exists: normal: del.approval.item
Update panel:decide.update.approval, call cc.set.approval when cartId not null or category is "service catalog" after add.
update approval status after call.cc.set.approval
add panel call.cc.set.approval, migrated from trigger.incidents.before.post
Service Catalog: If ESS user cancels request the approvals are not removed from the approver's list
function sig change function setApprovalsRecordState(id, state)
Made changes for TeleCenter/Connect.It. intergration ST22997
Added call to billing after call to generate explines.
Changed panel set in trigger.incidents.after.update to set operator in $L.cmlabor=operator() instead of operator in $L.cmlabor=opened.by in $L.file
Switched error message to include last panel executed.
Added message to the error exit so that we will have some indication that there was a problem.
Only cut expense lines if module is enabled
If the call is not closed then set first.call=false
